subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets have signed 19 of their top 20 draft picks, and in many instances they granted signing bonuses that exceeded those recommended by baseball, an uncommon move by the franchise.
snippet: The Mets have signed 19 of their top 20 draft picks, and in many instances they granted signing bonuses that exceeded those recommended by baseball, an uncommon move by the franchise.
